name: TEIY - The Enemy Is You
description:
TEIY - The Enemy Is You is our first turn-based puzzle game where meeting with yourself means Game Over.

Time travel. Past selves. Mindblowing security systems. To leave each security room alive, you will have to use them to your advantage. Will you be able to beat the 5 levels of this demo ?

Looking forward to become much more than this demo, TEIY - The Enemy Is You adds exploration, investigation, atypic characters in a post-apocalyptic world, and crazy time paradoxes.

                                                                                                              SUBSCRIBE TO OUR NEWSLETTER

We are developping our first video game, and today you can play the demo here on itch.io. You are very welcome to share your feedbacks and thus to help us create a wonderful experience for everybody.

We are an indie video game studio, and you are our best support to spread the word about our game. Follow us !
